onboardingdesc1: You don't have to wait all year long when the discounts start like everyone else, my points will bring you the discounts to you, because we have more than +400 partners and more than +3000 branches
onboardingdesc2: You will find offers and discounts on all brands, clothing and electronics stores, in addition to all the cafes and restaurants you love.
onboardingdesc3: Points provides you with offers and discounts in the best beauty salons, spas and recreational activities for you and your children
onboardingdesc4: Visit the store or cafe that has the discount, copy the QR code at the cashier, receive your points, get your rewards
